title: LGBTQ+
content: Inclusivity isn't merely a choice but a right deserved by all. Forge solutions to paint a colorful world where the queer community finds a safe space.

title: Mental Health
content: A sound human mind gives way to a healthy life. There's a delicate balance between mental and physical health. Striving to sustain this balance calls for intelligent solutions to keep one's mental health sheltered.

title: FinTech
content: The amalgamation of finance and technology is ushering our society into a new age of innovation and urbanization. Fintech should prudently be used to propogate financial freedom to every part of the country.

title: Period Poverty
content: Menstrual sanitation faces barriers of social, economic, and cultural factors. Overrule the stigma around periods and create innovations to aid the menstruating population.

title: Defence
content: The solutions for the welfare of the families of soldiers, especially widows, and injured victims, along with veterans of war, need drastic changes as we continue to rely on our defence sector.
